extraAttributes.name: img_test
extraAttributes.doc: Two hundred 16x16 pixel images given as a PennyLane tensor of shape (200, 16, 16).

extraAttributes.name: img_train
extraAttributes.doc: One thousand 16x16 pixel images given as a PennyLane tensor of shape (1000, 16, 16).

extraAttributes.name: labels_test
extraAttributes.doc: Labels corresponding to the images in img_test. 0 corresponds to '-', 1 corresponds to '+', 2 corresponds to '⊢' and 3 corresponds to '⊣'.

extraAttributes.name: labels_train
extraAttributes.doc: Labels corresponding to the images in img_train. 0 corresponds to '-', 1 corresponds to '+', 2 corresponds to '⊢' and 3 corresponds to '⊣'
